topic.title: Check out my chiptune music Zite.
topic.body:
http://localhost:43110/1GTyFqw5P8AcD9FyaZxouP35DF62Bz65AE/indexEN.html

4Bit music produced with a gameboy. Have fun!

1526455814_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6n.body:
> [thunder33345](#comment_143_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5FMX5K): we should have memes only zeronet users can understand!!!

serious... memes are the pulse of the free internet - a well moderated meme platform would help a lot.

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body:
not mine, but a cool trading card game, similar to well known trading card games, but with creative common licence.
...drawback for you: it's in german :P

http://127.0.0.1:43110/13VDeMgRgGf73mHsMrrorXkq4fhUKfBvPz/

1528345024_1rFttYwcvZTeYwTHDHC5iy5PsfwHh.body:
censorship - no
moderation - yes pls.

it would be great for the zero-talk sites if the creator of a topic could moderate the comments (or if users could choose this option when creating a topic)
editing is added to the "talk-sites" so i guess this is not that hard to implement.

> [thunder33345](#comment_137_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5FMX5K): hmm someone can just start a political and then "remove"/"hide" everyone who opposes them [...]

i don't see the problem.. just add a topic of your own ...

> [thunder33345](#comment_138_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5FMX5K): toho users can choose not to trust OP thus rendering the blacklist useless if they want so yeah, content isnt deleted but hidden

i cannot see any problems ... only improvement of the user experience...
it would be optional ...

topics that are moderated/topics that are not moderated. combined with a tagging system and filter - this would work just nice.

"only show moderated topics SFW"
"show all"
etc.

1549306180_1MvfJt4w7iUCEsraP8C8gqNHp5ZQi.body: All music Creative Common (also bug fixed)
@t0ny There will be more songs to come. But I don't want to come over the 10 mb Zite size. I will probably take some old songs offline for a while.
